channel.title: Titan Sword
channel.description:
Well, I watched Clash of the titans last night, and thought it would be fun to recreate the sword and add the 'Dylan' touch to it so to speak. I chose this because its not my style of sword and thought it would be fun to try something different.
heres my version [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/ZSw.jpg[/img] Wire frame: [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/wireframee.jpg[/img] please note that the thicker orangish lines are seams from where im UV mapping it. They do not affect poly. heres the origional [img]http://www.entertainmentearth.com/images/%5CAUTOIMAGES%5CNC49286lg.jpg[/img]
Please note that if I do release this, I will have to modify the design as I dont think it would show up as more than a blackish line. If I'm in the mood, I might make a set of this.

item.title: Titan Sword
item.dc:creator: @Org1 Org
item.description:
@Org1 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:2, topic:335488”]Looks great, but don’t make a set of them.

The handle/hilt could use some more design and touch up.

And change the colors, like more of the picture.[/quote]

Add nothing to the hilt, It would make it have too much on the sword, already has a pattern on the blade.

Read full topic

item.title: Titan Sword
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:17, topic:335488”][quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=431869.msg3171698#msg3171698 date=1270497437]
Thanks everyone. Any ways I can improve it?
[/quote]I really don’t see any. I think after seeing this that you are probably a master of Blender now. I think you should try animating soon.[/quote]
I can animate, but my area of expertise is modelling. I prefer to make the visual model than to animate it, I animated the human model I made like 6-10 months back.

Read full topic

item.title: Titan Sword
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:8, topic:335488”]Thanks everyone.
@Tribb: the movie was OK in 2D. If you see it, go see it in 3D, it was basically made for 3D. Tbh without the design I added to the blade, the sword would be too boring xD

Looks great, but don’t make a set of them.

The handle/hilt could use some more design and touch up.

And change the colors, like more of the picture.

he did say he was giving it the Dylan touch (Twss?)
@model: resembles the picture closely with minor texture flaws. Wireframe please?
It’s a good model, but it’s very basic. Not a fan of basicness.

Note that its basic as the reference image was basic. I wasnt trying to make it the most detailed peice ever, I was trying to make it resemble the pic.[/quote]
Hence why I said im not a fan of simple, not simple sucks

Read full topic

item.title: Titan Sword
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

Thanks everyone.
@Tribb: the movie was OK in 2D. If you see it, go see it in 3D, it was basically made for 3D. Tbh without the design I added to the blade, the sword would be too boring xD

[quote=“reyx7, post:3, topic:335488”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=431869.msg3170124#msg3170124 date=1270361654]
Looks great, but don’t make a set of them.

The handle/hilt could use some more design and touch up.

And change the colors, like more of the picture.
[/quote]
he did say he was giving it the Dylan touch (Twss?)
@model: resembles the picture closely with minor texture flaws. Wireframe please?
It’s a good model, but it’s very basic. Not a fan of basicness.[/quote]
Note that its basic as the reference image was basic. I wasnt trying to make it the most detailed peice ever, I was trying to make it resemble the pic.
